src:
Vladan Milojević: A taman sam hteo da ubacim drugog špica...
„Ne znam zašto je teren u Novom Sadu ovakav“, rekao je trener crveno-belih

02 Nov 2019

Pamtiće dugo Vladan Milojević meč u Novom Sadu. Kao trener Crvene zvezde iskusni stručnjak je zabeležio 100. pobedu u zvaničnim utakmicama. Sasvim dovoljno da se u dobrom raspoloženju dočeka predstojeći duel sa Totenhemom.„Znali smo da će biti ovakva utakmica. Prolter se odlično branio, znali smo da će biti tako. Stajali su u dva bloka. Mi smo hteli da imamo brži prenos lopte. Malo nam je teren odmogao. Ne znam zašto je podloga u Novom Sadu ovakva. Ipak, uspeli smo da otvorimo utakmicu baš u periodu kada sam hteo da ubacim drugog špica. Kod oba gola se video naš inidivualni kvalitet“, poručio je za TV Arenu Vladan Milojević.
(FOTO: Star SPORT)
text:
Vladan Milojevic: And I just wanted to put another spike in ...
"I don't know why the pitch in Novi Sad is like this," the red-and-white coach said

02 Nov 2019

The Vladan Milojevic match in Novi Sad will be remembered for a long time. As a Red Star coach, the seasoned expert recorded his 100th victory in official games. Suffice it to be in a good mood to meet the upcoming duel with Tottenham. "We knew it would be a match like this. Prolter defended very well, we knew it would be so. They stood in two blocks. We wanted to have a faster ball transfer. We got a little runny ground. I do not know why the base in Novi Sad is like this. Still, we were able to open the game just in time when I wanted to put in another spike. Both goals saw our individual quality, "Vladan Milojevic told TV Arena.
(PHOTO: Star SPORT)
